name: whiskey
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 a strong, pale brown alcoholic drink, originally from Scotland and Ireland, made from grain such as barley, corn, or rye
Examples
Some strong alcoholic drinks such as whiskey are made by distilling.The whiskey industry is campaigning for the taxes on different alcoholic drinks to be evened up.A manhattan contains whiskey and vermouth.She likes her whiskey neat.He sought oblivion in a bottle of whiskey.
